BriefSummary: Scarites subterraneus, known generally as the big-headed ground beetle or pedunculate ground beetle, is a species of ground beetle in the family Carabidae. It is found in the Caribbean, Central America, and North America.
WikiContents:
Scarites subterraneus, known generally as the big-headed ground beetle or pedunculate ground beetle, is a species of ground beetle in the family Carabidae. It is found in the Caribbean, Central America, and North America.
